name: Space Physics Puzzle
description:
Appeared that popular manga "space brothers" becomes exhilarating puzzle!
Aim a high score by connecting quickly the character of the space brothers!

■ Rule
- Become a score to disappear and turn off three or more the same character
- High scores lead long enough.
- When you connect five, "Ootama" is falling!
- "Ootama" four times the score!
- When connecting seven further, "red ball" is falling!
- A special jade disappear in only one "red ball".
- GET the high scores further the same character will disappear at once when you tap the "red ball"!
